attributes.additional_details: Abolish Fines for entering into bus lanes and the involvement of Sherriff Officer.  Road tax is payable for the roads, the motorist usage has been severely restricted by the use of bus lanes, creating situations where there is a lane of a road completely empty and the other lane/s will be at a standstill. Financial penalties do not alleviate congestion, they only add to revenue and cause hardship for the motorists who pay road tax.
